profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.editHint: Long press on a profile to edit...

sections.name: Profile Name
sections.privacyNote: Broke can't list the names of the apps due to privacy concerns, it is only able to see the amount of apps selected in the configuration screen.
sections.requireTagNote: When enabled, only the tag created for this profile can unblock it
